subject: AI & Agents
title: Bag of Words: The Simplest Representation
description: One-minute skill: Bag of Words: The Simplest Representation.

hook.text: Throw away word order. Just count how often each word appears. That's bag of words.

buildup.text: BoW turns a sentence into a vector where each dimension is a word count.

discovery.text: Simple but effective for spam detection, topic classification, and keyword matching.

twist.text: BoW ignores order: 'dog bites man' and 'man bites dog' look identical.

climax.text: For quick baselines, BoW + logistic regression is surprisingly hard to beat.

punchline.text: Count the words. Ignore the grammar. Ship the baseline.

quiz.question: What does bag of words ignore?
